itinerary.mapNote: Easy boardwalk start through old-growth. First sea stacks. 0–30m.
Most popular camp. Waterfall drops straight to beach. 0m.
Near Carmanah Lighthouse. Giant Sitka spruce grove. 0m.
Sheltered bay. Sandstone shelves and sea caves. 0m.
Final beach camp before steep climb inland. 0m.
Ferry across Gordon River. Port Renfrew trailhead. 0m.

waypoints.name: Pachena Bay (Start)
waypoints.note: Northern trailhead. Pachena Lighthouse. Pacific Rim National Park.

waypoints.name: Tsusiat Falls
waypoints.note: Waterfall drops directly onto beach. Most iconic photo on WCT.

waypoints.name: Carmanah Lighthouse
waypoints.note: Active lighthouse on exposed headland. Heritage buildings.

waypoints.name: Carmanah Giant Sitka
waypoints.note: Ancient Sitka spruce grove. Trees over 800 years old, 95m tall.

waypoints.name: Gordon River (Finish)
waypoints.note: Southern trailhead. Ferry crossing. Port Renfrew access.
